title: Funanigans: Party Games
notes: Steam shows Mixed (64% of 25). SteamDB shows 69.20% positive; small sample keeps score mid‑60s.
raw_comment: 8 party games. Phones/ tablets as controllers: Phonanigans (4+), FictionaLies (2+), Drawkward (3+), It's a Trap! (3+), SaboDrawage (3+), CoDrawperate (4+), Tallynanigans (2+), Shenunigans (4+).
